query.description: page number, starting from 0
Paging size
sort="severity,class,msg,object_id,status,alert_gen_epoch". For descending order, prefix the key with a dash (-). Ex: -name

filter="severity=value and class=value where value is one of Cifs, Storage, Cluster, Network, Security, Filesystem, Environment, Replication, HardwareFailure, SystemMaintenance, Syslog, Firmware, ha, Cloud, capacity, dataAvailability, infrastructure and msg=value and object_id=value and status=value and alert_gen_epoch=range and node_id=value". value should be a valid regular expression.
By default, it will show all of the alerts. If type is set to "true", show active alerts; otherwise, show all alerts.
